name: Blados: Journey Across the Stars DEMO
name_original: Blados: Journey Across the Stars DEMO
description:
A concept Demo for an RPG Maker game I'm calling Blados.
This demo you play as Justin and Gwen as you explore these ancient ruins on another world. In this dungeon you will encounter roaming enemies you can choose to engage and avoid. Spread throughout are items to help you make your way through as you chase an illusive figure deep in the dungeon.

Hope you enjoy! :)
